column5: Anybody have any reports from the Minaki area? Heading there in two days and was curious!

I've been at the cottage most weekends of late and have been doing so so if your looking for eaters. For fish over slot size has been amazing. I do all my fishing no more then a 1.5 miles north of the bridge. Friends of ours are doing far better in the way of eaters and numbers in big sand, but for size I generally got them beat. Worms and leeches for me trolling in and around 25'-0
